channel.title: PVP Outside Banks
channel.description: So, I have researched this for quite sometime now and every topic pertaining was very vague and unexplained. This is for 317 PI, someone please lend me a hand if possible with your suggestions. Link me to a tutorial if possible. ;D

item.title: PVP Outside Banks
item.dc:creator: @Docent Limits
item.description:
@Docent wrote:

This is for my RuneSource server. Convert it to work with PI

public boolean inBank() {
return Area(3090, 3099, 3487, 3500) || Area(3089, 3090, 3492, 3498) || Area(3248, 3258, 3413, 3428) || Area(3179, 3191, 3432, 3448) || Area(2944, 2948, 3365, 3374) || Area(2942, 2948, 3367, 3374) || Area(2944, 2950, 3365, 3370) || Area(3008, 3019, 3352, 3359) || Area(3017, 3022, 3352, 3357) || Area(3203, 3213, 3200, 3237) || Area(3212, 3215, 3200, 3235) || Area(3215, 3220, 3202, 3235) || Area(3220, 3227, 3202, 3229) || Area(3227, 3230, 3208, 3226) || Area(3226, 3228, 3230, 3211) || Area(3227, 3229, 3208, 3226) || Area(2953, 2999, 3326, 3354); //2999, 3354;
}

public boolean inWild() {
if (inBank() == true) {
return false;
} else {
return true;
}
}

item.title: PVP Outside Banks
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Just set all areas you want to pvp zones (I’m sure there’s a ton of tutorials on this).
Then get the coords for all banks, and make them safe zones (Again, there are tutorials…)
If you’re still having issues, post your errors, including code.

Read full topic
